DESCRIPTION: Increases attack damage taken and deals damage every turn.
Whenever you play a skill, gains Strength.
Whenever you play a card, take damage.
Gains Block at the end of its turn.
Applies Frail to you each turn.
Shuffles a Dazed into your draw pile each turn.
Applies abyss:Abysstouched to you each turn.
Shuffles a Slimed into your draw pile whenever you deal unblocked attack damage.
Caps how much HP can be lost each turn.
